solution_line_template: The available number of people in each car is {max_capacity_per_car} * {num_cars} cars = <<{max_capacity_per_car}*{num_cars}={max_car_capacity_total}>>{max_car_capacity_total} people.
The available number of people in each van is {max_capacity_per_van} * {num_vans} vans = <<{max_capacity_per_van}*{num_vans}={max_van_capacity_total}>>{max_van_capacity_total} people.

The total number of people that could go with the team is {max_car_capacity_total} people + {max_van_capacity_total} people = <<{max_car_capacity_total}+{max_van_capacity_total}={total_max_capacity}>>{total_max_capacity} people.
The team took with them {num_cars} cars * {people_per_car_actual} people = <<{num_cars}*{people_per_car_actual}={people_in_cars_actual}>>{people_in_cars_actual} people.
The team also took {num_vans} vans * {people_per_van_actual} people = <<{num_vans}*{people_per_van_actual}={people_in_vans_actual}>>{people_in_vans_actual} people.
The team brought {people_in_cars_actual} people + {people_in_vans_actual} people =<<{people_in_cars_actual}+{people_in_vans_actual}={total_people_actual}>>{total_people_actual} people.

The team could bring an additional {total_max_capacity} people - {total_people_actual} people = <<{total_max_capacity}-{total_people_actual}={additional_people_possible}>>{additional_people_possible} people.
